item.title: Beliefs Worth Examining
item.description: What would your belief system - your religion and politics, for example - have to do to cause you to reject it? It’s a question for our ideology-driven times. Decades ago I believed in almost every facet of the Christian Nationalist dream, including their beliefs about sexuality. I ignored the human experience, following ideology instead. Then, as a chaplain in training, I sat by a gay man who lost his partner moments before.

item.title: Soft Landings
item.description: Sometimes our beliefs - our certainties - come crashing down around us. How we weather those storms is dependent on the people…
